action.action-desc: Mr. O'Halleran (for himself, Mr. Gallego, and Ms. Sinema) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for priority in the award of State home facility grants to nursing homes and domiciliaries from States that the Secretary determines have a great or significant need for beds and which are located at least 100 miles away from the nearest existing State home facility.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fairness for Rural Veterans Act of 2017.

section.header: Department of Veterans Affairs priority for State home facility grants
section.text: Section 8135(c)(2) of title 38, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating subparagraphs (D) through (H) as subparagraphs (E) through (I), respectively; and
by inserting after subparagraph (C) the following new subparagraph (D):

subparagraph.text: An application for construction or acquisition of a nursing home or domiciliary from a State that the Secretary determines, in accordance with regulations under this subchapter, has a great or significant need for beds and which is located at least 100 miles away from the nearest existing State home facility.
